channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.description:
Report E-2024100255

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

item.title: Report E-2024100212
item.description:
Report E-2024100212

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-10T09:22:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-11
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 05:29 EST on 9/11, XPO-LTU contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 2 quarts of "Heat-Flex Hi-Temp 500" from a 5-gallon metal pail impacting the outer shrink wrap. The freight was crushed due to poor loading by BCO. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the spill with terminal-issued PPE. The damaged pail was staged on site for terminal personnel to manage.
